parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Identifier of toolbar; this is the same Cookie you specified in ISwAddin::ConnectToSW

parameters.name: ToolbarId
parameters.description: ID of the toolbar as defined in swToolbar_e

parameters.name: ToolbarState
parameters.description: Toolbar state to query as defined in swToolbarStates_e

title: ISldWorks.GetToolbarState2
description: Gets the state of the toolbar.
signature:
System.Boolean GetToolbarState2( 
   System.Int32
Cookie
,
   System.Int32
ToolbarId
,
   System.Int32
ToolbarState
)

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Identifier of toolbar; this is the same Cookie you specified in ISwAddin::ConnectToSW

parameters.name: ToolbarId
parameters.description: ID of the toolbar as defined in swToolbar_e

parameters.name: ToolbarState
parameters.description: Toolbar state to query as defined in swToolbarStates_e

returns: True or false based on the value specified in ToolbarState
remarks:
For information about using this method with the
ISwAddin
object, see
Using ISwAddin to Create a SOLIDWORKS Add-in
.
